thread.title: Victorian MPs Don Nardella Telmo Languiller quit over expense scandal - Yahoo7
thread.title_full: Victorian MPs Don Nardella Telmo Languiller quit over expense scandal - Yahoo7

author: Helen Velissaris
title: Victorian MPs Don Nardella Telmo Languiller quit over expense scandal - Yahoo7
text:
Share Victorian MPs Don Nardella Telmo Languiller quit over expense scandal - Yahoo7 Victorian MP Don Nardella has resigned as parliamentary Deputy Speaker, just hours after the state's Speaker, Telmo Languiller, did the same over an expense scandal. Close Victorian speaker Telmo Languiller quits over $40,000 expenses scandal UP NEXT VIDEO Victorian speaker Telmo Languiller quits over $40,000 expenses scandal. Source: 7 News Victorian speaker Telmo Languiller quits over $40,000 expenses scandal 
Mr Nardella and Mr Languiller were found this week to have claimed a second residence allowance which is designed to support country MPs who live more than 80km from the city and who maintain a second home in Melbourne. Labor MPs Telmo Languiller (pictured) and Don Nardella have quit their positions as Victoria's parliamentary Speaker and Deputy Speaker. Picture: AAP 
Mr Nardella claimed an allowance for living an hour away from his electorate in Ocean Grove on the Bellarine Peninsula since April 2014, receiving about $100,000 in allowances. 
In a statement posted via his Twitter on Saturday, Mr Nardella said he had "acted in accordance with all rules regarding Member of Parliament allowances" but had decided to withdraw his position as deputy speaker. 
Earlier in the day fellow Labor MP Telmo Languiller announced his resignation as Speaker as it was not enough just to pay back his $37,000 second residence allowances.
